public class ExponentialStream
extends RandomStream
Returns a number from an exponential distribution with the given mean.

ExponentialStream(double)
Create stream with mean 'm'.
ExponentialStream(double, int)
Create stream with mean 'm'.
ExponentialStream(double, int, long, long)
Create stream with mean 'm'.

getNumber()
Return stream number.

ExponentialStream 
  public ExponentialStream(double m)
Create stream with mean 'm'.
ExponentialStream 
  public ExponentialStream(double m,
                           int StreamSelect)
Create stream with mean 'm'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' stream values.
ExponentialStream 
  public ExponentialStream(double m,
                           int StreamSelect,
                           long MGSeed,
                           long LCGSeed)
Create stream with mean 'm'. Skip the first 'StreamSelect' stream values. Pass seeds 'MGSeed' and 'LCGSeed' to the base class.

Return stream number.
